name: Ultimate Navy Gunner
description:
Untimate Navy Gunner is a multi-level game that emphasis on providing sensational entertainment to the users worldwide. The game has a naval game play and provides real navy battle. The game actually offers the real naval battle field and let you experience the charisma of the gun.

Take the control of the ship and hit the enemies ships, jets and helicopters. Hit the snipers and control their ships. Take the pledge and shoot the enemies.

How to Play
Tap the play button
Select the level
Keep on winning the levels
